com.microsoft.azure.documentdb

Class ConsistencyPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.JsonSerializable
      • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.ConsistencyPolicy

  • public final class ConsistencyPolicy
extends JsonSerializable
    Encapsulates the settings for consistency policy in the Azure DocumentDB database service.
